instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I have this 820-00138 can't power on or off neither power pads or keyboard and i have same working board to measure the voltage on SMC_ONOFF is same voltage like the working board. any ideas why board doesn't turn on and off ???

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message:
Does it power on when connecting the charger?
Do you have green light?
Power rails?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: yes when i plug the charger powers on and i have green light

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Just to clarify, this board is booting and working? Just the power button does not work?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: yes the board is working fine just power button and pads issue

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Check SMC_LID is high. Also do not comment on a topic, use the reply option.

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: SMC_LID is 3.2v and when i have the computer on and try to close the lid that shuts of the lCD and the fans stop spinning not sure what is the proper voltage on SMC_lid

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Is SMC_ONOFF going low when you press the power button? Was this liquid?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: SMC_ONOFF going to from 3,2V to 0v when i press the power button

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: 2nd time, was this liquid??

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: No liquid damage on the board

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: PM_PWRBTN_L toggle when power button is pressed/pads shorted?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: PM_PWRBTN_L doesn't toggle when the  power button is pressed/ pads shorted

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: When you do an SMC reset (left shift+alt+ctrl+pwrbtn) does the machine immediately turn off and magsafe turn green?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I just realized, are you using a REAL 85W charger?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I can't reset smc reset the keyboard is not working. I have 3 new keyboards new trackpad and cable but i did manual SMC reset before on pin 5 on U5110 and when i do that the magsafe light switch from orange to green and back to orange so i know i reset the SMC and on your other question yes i use 85W original apple charger

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I have all Voltages present on the keyboard pins connector im missing only left option and left shift

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Does pin 7 of U5110 go low when you press the power button? Must be a break in the SMC_ONOFF trace somewhere

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: so on pin 7 from 3.2v i get 1.1v when i press the power button

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: 1.1 seems a bit high. Is it the same at the KBD connector?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: it goes down to 0.8v at the connector

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Do some resistance measurements on the different points where you can get to SMC_ONOFF to the KBD connector pin.

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: PP3V42_G3H is short to ground i measure in diode mode on pin 1 on R5170 I get 0.7 and measure on pin 2 i get 0.068. Any ideas what to do ?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I don't see how the board could even work like that. Are you measuring with power applied?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I don't have bench power supply to inject voltage :(

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Read my question again....

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I measure no power applied i wonder also how the board also working

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: With 0.06 Ohms on 3V42 there is no way this board work. Go and check again.

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: I checked 3 times in diode mode the red probe on ground and measure with 2 different multimeters same result. I'm really confused

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message:
Well something must get warm with such a low resistance. Feel around the board, SMC would be a good suspect.

I still don't see how the board can work. If resistance to GND on 3V42 is 0.06 Ohms then the current would be 3.42/0.06=57A!

Is the battery and AC really disconnected when measuring this?

Also check resistance to GND on L7095

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: Everything is disconnected no power no battery and on L7095 resistance was same. So i got power supply from old desktop computer and i inject 3.3v and didn't change anything and after i inject 5v and after that was showing me 0.2 resistance but now dropped to 0.1 resistance and the board is still turning to OS

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message:
You inject 5V on a 3.4V bus? Please, what the hell are you doing?? 

I have no idea what you are doing anymore. If you inject 3.3V on a 0.1 Ohm short something will start getting hot.

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: i injected 3.3v on PP3V42 nothing was hot after that i injected 5v on same rail PP3v42 and the resistance from 0.06 went up to 0.1

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message:
Let me do some Ohms law for you. I=U/R, I=3.3/0.1=33Amps. I'm curious to see what power supply you are using that supplies 33A. Also smoke should be coming from somewhere and there is NO WAY this board can even have a green light. P=U*I P=3.3*33=109W. Something must be dissipating 109W which is some serious heat!
I have no idea what you are measuring or doing so I can't give any more advice at this point. Is this board even working at this point?

threads.title: 820-00138 can't power on or off on keyboard or power pads
threads.message: The board is working fine just no power button and no keyboard
